DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test whether memantine has a prophylactic effect on chronic tension-type headaches.
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Effect of Memantine in Chronic Tension-Type Headache
DOC.criteria: Chronic tensiontype headache Normal urine pH More than 1 migraine attack/month Other major illnesses Overuse of medicine/alcohol Women not using AC Pregnant/breastfeeding women Allergy to memantine
